name: Groundcrew
overview:
Groundcrew activates your social networks and lists. It turns them into action networks, putting mission control in your pocket.

Groundcrew makes a new level of coordination possible in society, so we can face the challenges of the 21st century, come together as tighter communities, and make every business and every organization run smoother. Groundcrew does this by seeing who’s available and collecting input in advance; allowing you to contact them via SMS, IM, email, or Twitter; and assemble teams by location, interests, and skills.
